name: Fish for gold
description:
To all lovers of research and fishing: underwater hunting! In this game you will be in the place of a hunter of fish in the ocean. You need to catch all the fish, for each of which you will be given money. But be careful! In addition to harmless fish, there are dangerous sharks and octopuses. Catch them all!
In game:
Interesting map
Many species of fish
Predatory and inoffensive fish
Underwater tunnels
Sunken cargo and much more ...
